description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 20/3906/FUL dated 03/08/22 for 'Phased redevelopment of site comprising the demolition of all existing buildings and structures and construction of a mixed-use development to comprise a two storey podium level with three buildings above ranging in height from 20 to 24 storeys providing a range of uses including up to 470 residential units (Class C3), office and workspace (Class B1), self-storage (Class B8), flexible community space (Class D1) and a caf√© (Class A3), associated car and cycle parking, public open space, landscaping, vehicular and pedestrian routes, servicing and access arrangements and other associated works. (The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement).' Amendments include: Revision of affordable housing quantum and distribution at Building C; Approved energy centre now split across both podiums at ground level; Relocation of plant equipment from Level 02 to ground floor; Relocation of tank rooms to podium; Reduction of non-residential plant area; Additional substation and relocation of entrance to B8 self-storage area; Introduction of localised excavated area to accommodate plant equipment required for the revised MEP strategy; Reduction of non-residential plant area; Parking layout amendments (with no change to quantum of parking spaces); Relocation of plant from level 02 podium to ground level; Relocation of 3B5P home from ground floor to level 02 podium; Layout amendments to flexible community floorspace; Reduction in private terraces at podium level; Adjustments to footpaths and alignments with entrances as a result of building footprint changes; Typical floorplans amended to accommodate increased smoke-shaft floorspace to accommodate revised MEP strategy; Amendments to elevations to reflect all revisions as relevant; Consolidated PV panels to accommodate revised MEP strategy; Rooftop plant to be redistributed across buildings
